name: Koin DSL
desc: Koin - a pragmatic lightweight dependency injection framework for Kotlin

name: Firebase
desc: Firebase gives you functionality like analytics, databases, messaging and crash reporting so you can move quickly and focus on your users.

name: Glide
desc: Glide is a fast and efficient open source media management and image loading framework for Android that wraps media decoding, memory and disk caching, and resource pooling into a simple and easy to use interface.

name: Timber
desc: A logger with a small, extensible API which provides utility on top of Android's normal Log class.

name: Android Architecture Components
desc: Android architecture components are a collection of libraries that help you design robust, testable, and maintainable apps. Start with classes for managing your UI component lifecycle and handling data persistence.

name: Ink Pager Indicator
desc: InkPageIndicator created by @nickbutcher for Plaid https://github.com/nickbutcher/plaid and backported by me for API 14+ (4.0+)

name: PhotoView
desc: PhotoView aims to help produce an easily usable implementation of a zooming Android ImageView.

name: Coil
desc: Image loading for Android backed by Kotlin Coroutines.
